```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
```

## Problem 1
Read in Mr. Trashweel data set.
```{r}
trashwheel_df <- read_xlsx(
  "./data/Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
  sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
  range = cell_cols("A:N")) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(
    sports_balls = round(sports_balls),
    sports_balls = as.integer(sports_balls)
  )
```
